name: Ashen Blight
description:
It's 1668 and everyone you know and love has abandoned the town you all once resided in. You've been left behind due to your illness, The White Death. 

It affects the brain so you become increasingly insane while your skin transforms to white and flakes away before your eyes...

You need to find the cure and have an idea on what you need for it. Complete the puzzles to discover your fate! 

Instructions:

WASD Movement Controls

Mouse Look

'E' To Interact 

Esc to Pause

Enter to skip credits

MUST PLAY 1920x1080

The game has a problem where it doesn't close at the end. If this happens, just press 'Alt' and 'F4' at the same time and the game will close instantly.

Game by Callum Carthy & Rosie Carter
